biotools.summary: DiversityReferences (DWB-DR) is an application of Diversity Workbench (DWB). It might be installed as part of a DWB environment, but also as a stand-alone application, e. g., in a local installation. Each DWB module is devoted to a specific data domain. DR is focussed on the management of bibliographic data about each kind of scientific publications. The tool is handling literature annotations, abstracts, keywords and any kind of descriptors and publication object identifiers. DR is able to import and export literature citations and is used to organise documents and multimedia resources.
